description:
From the Rolls Royce of chalk to the world’s most expensive marble, we explore businesses making rare art supplies, and keeping ancient crafts alive.

00:00:00 - Intro
00:00:20 - Chalk
00:14:58 - Colored Pencils
00:27:46 - Calacatta Marble
00:35:01 - Moroccan Tiles
00:49:38 - Sable Brushes
00:55:36 - Pastels
01:08:41 - Oil Paint
01:13:48 - Porcelain
01:21:03 - Venice Glass
01:32:49 - Rogan Art
01:38:47 - Marble Inlay
01:52:05 - Indian Metal Art
01:58:06 - Dhokra Art
02:07:29 - Credits
